https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kfnuAz9WuXbLgb6cNfeKuuaGwZB.jpg On the eve of its demolition, Berta visits the old theater where her grandmother used to work. She finds out that it's not completely abandoned - Mortando Malone and Big Blue Cat, her old imaginary friends, are there to help her solve an impossible case: recapture her capacity to dream. Blue & Malone: Impossible Cases
